thread.title: EPA: Higher reported GHG totals from oil, gas in 2014 came from more sites
thread.title_full: EPA: Higher reported GHG totals from oil, gas in 2014 came from more sites

title: EPA: Higher reported GHG totals from oil, gas in 2014 came from more sites
text:
20 EPA: Higher reported GHG totals from oil, gas in 2014 came from more sites 
Oil and Gas Journal (online registration required): Petroleum and natural gas systems remained the second-largest greenhouse gas emitting group, according to the US Environmental Protection Agency's 2014 summary of reported emissions, released Oct. 6. But it became hard to determine how much of the nearly 3.5% increase in the group's total emissions increase from 2013 was because the number of reporting facilities had grown 10.3% year-to-year.
